tool_description: An API showing all the latest Football Players News around the world
title: Football Players News

api_list.name: Get news for specific Football Player
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back news about selected player from many sites
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-players-news.p.rapidapi.com/{playersurname}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-players-news.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
